text: Joe Sweet (born July 5, 1948) is a former professional wide receiver for the Los Angeles Ramshttps://www.pro-football- reference.com/players/S/SweeJo00.htmhttps://www.pe.com/2016/01/26/rams-rosey- grier-other-ex-players-sound-off-on-nfls-return-to-la/ Sweet attended Rochelle High School in Lakeland, Florida. In college he attended Tennessee State University. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Los Angeles Rams players Category:American football wide receivers Category:New England Patriots players Category:San Diego Chargers players Category:Tennessee State Tigers football players
title: Joe Sweet
